main event: A UFO sighting was reported near Rockford, Michigan on July 6, 1957, lasting approximately 30 minutes.
interesting points: The UFO was described as round, with the apparent size of a walnut, and changed colors from red, green, to yellow.
Three objects were observed, with two in the west and one in the northeast.
It left a small red exhaust upon departure, indicating potential propulsion.
The weather conditions at the time of the sighting were clear with unlimited visibility and no wind or clouds.
The report was received by a radio dealer, adding credibility to the witness.
